author: LaurentDardenne
body:
The element 'InheritMembers' (ETS) do not works.
 
Steps to reproduce
------------------
```Powershell
$Path='C:\temp'
$File='Test.ps1xml'

Add-type @'
using System;

namespace Test
{
    public class One
    {

        public string A { get; set; }
        public String B { get; set; }
        public string C { get; set; } 

        public One()
        {
            A = "A";
            B = "B";
            C = "C";
        }
   }
   
   public class Two:One
   {

        public string D { get; set; }
        public String E { get; set; }
        public string F { get; set; } 

        public Two():base()
        {
            D = "D";
            E = "E";
            F = "F";
        }
   }
}
'@

@'
<Types>
 <Type>
  <Name>Test.One</Name>
  <Members>
      <MemberSet>
          <Name>PSStandardMembers</Name>  
          <Members>
              <PropertySet>
                  <Name>DefaultDisplayPropertySet</Name>
                  <ReferencedProperties>
                      <Name>A</Name>
                      <Name>B</Name>
                  </ReferencedProperties>
              </PropertySet>
          </Members>
      </MemberSet>
  </Members>
 </Type>
  <Type>
  <Name>Test.Two</Name>
  <Members>
      <MemberSet>
          <Name>PSStandardMembers</Name>
          <InheritMembers>true</InheritMembers>
          <Members>
              <PropertySet>
                  <Name>DefaultDisplayPropertySet</Name>
                  <ReferencedProperties>
                      <Name>D</Name>
                      <Name>E</Name>
                  </ReferencedProperties>
              </PropertySet>
          </Members>
      </MemberSet>
  </Members>
 </Type>
</Types>
'@ > "$Path\$File"

$One=[Test.One]::new()
$Two=[Test.Two]::new()
$One
# A B C
# - - -
# A B C

$Two
# D : D
# E : E
# F : F
# A : A
# B : B
# C : C

Update-TypeData -PrependPath "$Path\$File"
$One
# A B
# - -
# A B

$Two
# D E
# - -
# D E
```

Expected behavior
-----------------
```powershell
$Two
# A B D E
# - - - -
# A B D E
```

Actual behavior
---------------
```powershell
$Two
# D E
# - -
# D E
```
